textIssues: Show title not found in text
wrongFullText:
Steve Hayes’ newest show Steve Hayes: Tired Old Queen At the Movies has been added to the lineup of shows that will be part of GAYFEST NYC. The piece, a live version of the performer’s popular YouTube show, will run May 24-26 in the June Havoc Theater at the Abingdon Theatre Arts Complex. Vincent J. Cardinal will direct the production.

In the show, Hayes revisits classic movies, exploring not only how they were made, but also, what happens when they become the fixation of a little gay boy from upstate New York who was “raised by Warner Brothers. The performer will be joined by John K. Bixler and special guest stars at each evening’s performance.

Gayfest, as previously announced, will run May 6 – June 6, and will also include Romeo and Hamlet, Mother Tongue, The Legacy, and This One Girl’s Story.

For further information, visit: www.gayfestnyc.com.
